title: How to level up honor
body: I have honor level 2 but I don't know how to level it up! Plz help me senpai.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: You can level up just by playing, as long as you stick to the rules and play the game. As Riot put it in the [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148), "Just show up, don't be an asshole, and you'll rise over the coming weeks and months." Of course, earning Honours will (slightly) increase your progress, as well.
What if i get 2 times honor from whole team , how big is that boost  (i was not premade) ?

If you're referring to the "Honour boost" when everyone on the team Honours someone else, I'm fairly certain that is a small "buff", something like 10-20% extra (from that match), probably. Mind you, there's not been any specifics given on *how much* of a boost it actually gives.
how many honors would u have to get to move on? i've gotten around 30 honors so far and a lot of boosts, around how many more do i need?

There's no "pre-set" quantity of Honours that will get you to the next level. the system is more about consistency than quantity, so it's much more a question of "how many games" rather than "how many Honours" (and even then, that's still not exactly how it works). The only requirements for progressing towards the next Honour level are that you play and stay within the rules, or as the FAQ puts it "Just show up, don't be an asshole and you'll rise over the coming weeks and months". Receiving Honours does (slightly) increase your progress, though.

Given the nature of the system, it does seem to be skewed more towards taking several months to climb to Honour 5, which makes sense since it's tied to the season (similarly to ranked and ranked rewards). I doubt there'd be a whole lot of people with Honour 3 (if any) yet, and if there are they'd be on OCE (since we got the Honour update 2 weeks [or, rather, one patch cycle] before other servers).
Can you level up your honor by playing bot matches?
